TopicTitle: Is the Elder scrolls online Tamriel unlimited a good MMO?

Articles.Content: Is the the elder scrolls online tamriel unlimited a good MMO?And is it fun i thought the beta was meh and did not seem to get in to WoW.Is ESO:TU easy to get into?And is it worth trying?

They want an up-front payment for online game. Nice. No trial, no demo, nothing. Who gonna buy it? And, when wave of sales ends, where they gonna get money for content expansions? I think this game will die very soon.

[Rumors warning]

From what I heard, game mechanics have nothing in common with original games, and it's PvP only world.

If you want good TES game, get TES 4 Oblivion, and install some graphic mods.

> 
> No.

 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) that in deth answer though! 
elder scrolls online is trying to be two things and at best being Lukewarm (Ok)(I don't know if other countries use that phrase) at them. Its trying to be an MMO and the feel of the clasic elder scrolls gameplay. It's pvp is not the best and theirs no real adventure like the originals. But it's ok if you like MMO.
